roleset.name: judge, decide

roles.note: Beneficiary arguments should be tagged as ArgM-GOL.

example.name: All arguments
example.text: In 2002, the Los Angeles Superior Court threw out their arbitration of a dispute because they had not done things ethically.

example.name: NP only, Arg 0
example.text: A New York Stock Exchange arbitration panel

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb entry arbitrate.01, OntoNotes grouping arbitration-n senses 1 & 2; no mapping to VN. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Arg0 and ArgM-GOL
example.text: As I said before the BBB settles all claims of people who choose not to pay for their arbitration in favor of the company.

example.name: Arg 0 and different ArgM-GOL
example.text: Seagal's side agreed to stay their arbitration against Nguyen pending the hearing.
